name: ExpandableCell
summary: Easiest way to expand and collapse cell for iOS with Swift 5
description: Easiest usage of expandable & collapsible cell for iOS, written in Swift 5. You can customize expandable `UITableViewCell` whatever you like. `YNExpandableCell` is made because `insertRows(at indexPaths, with animation` and `deleteRows(at indexPaths, with animation` is hard to use. You can just inheirt `YNTableViewDelegate` and add one more method `func tableView(_ tableView: YNTableView, expandCellAt indexPath) -> UITableViewCell?`
